participant_1.background:
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
i had to call 911 when i had a terrible headache.
i like to take drives in the country.
i wish i had money to travel.
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
I went to the movies with my family and watched a movie about a teacher who inspired her students to be the best they could be.
my mother is a librarian.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
My cat Sherlock and I love to watch mystery movies together.

content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah! What's your name?
I'm Joe, nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
Well, I like to write on my blog, take drives in the country, and watch my lizard bask in the sun.
That sounds cool! I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
Aww, that's cute! What's your dog's name?
His name is Buddy!
What kind of dog is he?
He's a Golden Retriever.
Oh, I love Golden Retrievers! They're so sweet.
They are! He's my best friend.
I'm glad to hear you have a great friend. I love animals.
Me too! They're the best companions.
I agree! What's your favorite animal?
I think my favorite animal is a panda. They're so cute and cuddly!
Pandas are adorable! I love watching them eat bamboo.
Me too! They're so funny.
I'm glad we're both animal lovers!
Me too! It's nice to have something in common.
Yes, it is! I'm glad we met.
Me too
